Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface UserInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CLI, GUI
public interface UserInterface
This class is an interface to what the client will see, it contains a NetworkManager which takes requests from the View and sends them to the server

    • showLobby

      void showLobby()
      Once a lobby with the given rules is found, this screen will let the user decide if they're ready, start the game if they're the host and see how many players are ready in the lobby

    • showSuccessReadyStatus

      void showSuccessReadyStatus(boolean status)
      Shows that the status was successfully received by the server
      Parameters:
      status - the status that the user is currently in true if the choice was "ready"

    • showErrorReadyStatus

      void showErrorReadyStatus(boolean status)
      Shows that the status was not correctly received by the server
      Parameters:
      status - the status that the user tried to send true if the choice was "ready"

    • setGameInterrupted

      void setGameInterrupted(boolean interrupted)
      Set to true in case something ends the game, this will interrupt the main game interface
      Parameters:
      interrupted - true if there has been a problem and the game ended

    • setUpdateAvailable

      void setUpdateAvailable(boolean available)
      Set to true whenever a view update is available (called via the asynchronous method)
      Parameters:
      available - true if an updated view has been received

      void setYourTurn(boolean isYourTurn)

      Parameters:
      isYourTurn - true if it's this player's turn
